tasks.title: Morning Tribute Check
tasks.description: Start your day by checking your tribute balance. If it's below $50, add $20 immediately.
tasks.instructions: Take a screenshot of your account balance and tribute amount added.

tasks.title: Evening Reflection
tasks.description: Write a brief reflection on how you served today. What could you have done better?
tasks.instructions: Write at least 3 sentences about your service today.

tasks.title: Midday Devotion
tasks.description: Take a 5-minute break to meditate on your purpose and dedication.
